title: Manage a Vessel Departure
description: A vessel has completed cargo operations and is ready to depart. The operator must coordinate its sailing.

tasks.description: Receive the Estimated Time of Departure (ETD) from the vessel's agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator receives and logs the ETD.

tasks.description: Schedule pilot, tugs, and mooring gang services for the ETD.
tasks.expected_outcome: All necessary departure services are booked in the system.

tasks.description: Notify the Vessel Traffic Service (VTS) of the planned departure to ensure a clear channel.
tasks.expected_outcome: The VTS acknowledges the sailing plan and confirms the departure window.
